name: Future Horizons Reborn
description:
A procedurally generated laboratory where the player is set to find and enable electronic modules terraforming an existing hostile planet for humans to settle with the ticking inevitability of life on earth coming to a close.

 *gasp* I don't recommend hard mode or medium if you've got a punny little wifi connection or computer cuz procedural generation goes BRRRRRRR.

All 3D models, images, and audio clips are open source:
(Here are all the open-source artists I borrowed from)
~ProcyonA for the Aurora Nebula art
~Grabrela for the Nature home art
~https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/beep-6-96243/
~https://www.1001fonts.com/horizons-font.html
